law.catch_line: The appropriate criminal justice unit should inform a victim of a crime, a victim's representative, ...

text.section: The appropriate criminal justice unit should inform a victim of a crime, a victim's representative, or a witness of the guidelines listed in subsection (b) of this section.

section.section: The Department shall make the guidelines in subsection (b) of this section available to the units involved with carrying out the guidelines.
To the extent feasible, the guidelines in subsection (b) of this section shall be printed by Maryland Correctional Enterprises.
